places.title: Rua Portugal
places.description: A charming street in São Luís, known for its colonial architecture and cultural history.

places.title: Biblioteca Benedito Leite
places.description: A historic library in São Luís, offering a rich collection of books and manuscripts.

places.title: Palácio dos Leões
places.description: A historical palace that serves as the governor's residence, overlooking the São Marcos Bay.

places.title: Palácio De La Ravardiere
places.description: A colonial-era palace with significant architectural and historical importance in São Luís.

places.title: Raposa Beach
places.description: Beautiful beach with calm waters, ideal for relaxation and enjoying local seafood delicacies.

places.title: Arthur Azevedo Theater
places.description: An elegant theater showcasing classical and contemporary performances in São Luís.

places.title: Lençóis Maranhanses
places.description: An awe-inspiring national park with vast sand dunes and crystal-clear lagoons.

places.title: Alcântara City
places.description: A breathtaking colonial town, rich in historical ruins and cultural heritage.
